questions.text: How many episodes of Fawlty Towers were made?
In 'A Touch Of Class' what was the name of the Lord visiting the hotel who turned out to be a con man?
questions.explanation:
Lord Melbury.

	Lord Melbury was played by Michael Gwynn.

questions.text: In 'The Hotel Inspectors', what was the profession of Mr Hutchinson?
questions.explanation:
Spoons.

	Mr Hutchinson specializes in spoons.

questions.text: How many years of marriage were Basil and Sybil celebrating in 'The Anniversary'?
questions.explanation:
15.

	Basil and Sybil's anniversary was on the 17th April.

questions.text: What were the names of the eldery ladies who were residents at the Hotel?
questions.explanation:
Tibbs and Gatsby.

	Miss Tibbs played by Gilly Flower Miss Gatsby played by Renee Roberts

questions.text: In 'The Anniversary' Polly wanted to borrow 100 pounds for what?
questions.explanation:
Car.

	Polly finally got the money by dressing up as Sybil after she stormed out after Basil 'forgot' their Anniversary

questions.text: In 'Gourmet Night' what was the name of the chef that took a fancy to Manuel?
questions.explanation:
Kurt.

	Kurt drowned his sorrows with wine, passing out in the kitchen and ruining the evening for Basil

questions.text: In 'The Builders' what was the name of the professional builder chosen by Sybil?
questions.explanation:
Stubbs.

	Basil secretly arranged by O'Reilly to complete work on the hotel and ended up nearly demolishing it.

questions.text: In 'The Kipper and The Corpse' what newspaper did Mr Leeman choose to go with his kippers?
questions.explanation:
Telegraph.

	Mr Leeman's requirements were Kippers,Toast,Butter,Marmalade,Tea

questions.text: In 'Waldorf Salad' how many taxis did Mr Hamilton order for the guests after Basil kicked out all the guests?
questions.explanation:
10.

	In The end the guests stayed and Basil left... only to return 10 seconds later to book in as a guest. WELL DONE FOR COMPLETING THE FAWLTY TOWERS QUIZ
